languages.text: "Другие меня уже вдовой зовут и сервиторской женой, но я знаю — ты еще здесь, родной. Ну хоть взгляни на меня..."

traits.locale_text: "Другие меня уже вдовой зовут и сервиторской женкой, но я знаю — ты еще здесь, родной. Ну хоть взгляни на меня..."

languages.text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
languages.original_text: "Другие меня уже вдовой зовут и сервиторской женой, но я знаю — ты еще здесь, родной. Ну хоть взгляни на меня..."

traits.locale_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
"People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
"People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
"People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
"People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

languages.text: «La gente me llama viuda y se mofa de mí por estar casada con un servidor, pero yo sé que aún sigues ahí dentro, amor mío. Si tan solo me mirases a los ojos...».
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

traits.locale_text: «La gente me llama viuda y se mofa de mí por estar casada con un servidor, pero yo sé que aún sigues ahí dentro, amor mío. Si tan solo me mirases a los ojos...».

languages.text: 「人は私を『未亡人』『サーヴィターの妻』と呼ぶが、私はあなたがまだそこにいることを知っているわ、私の愛しい人よ。せめて私を見てくれれば…」
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

traits.locale_text: 「人は私を『未亡人』『サーヴィターの妻』と呼ぶが、私はあなたがまだそこにいることを知っているわ、私の愛しい人よ。せめて私を見てくれれば…」

languages.text: “他们都说我是个寡妇，说我成了机仆的老婆，但我知道你就在这里，亲爱的。我只希望你能看我一眼……”
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

traits.locale_text: “他们都说我是个寡妇，说我成了机仆的老婆，但我知道你就在这里，亲爱的。我只希望你能看我一眼……”

languages.text: "Die Leute bezeichnen mich als Witwe und Frau eines Servitors, aber ich weiß, du bist noch da drin, mein Liebster. Würdest du mich doch nur ansehen ..."
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leute bezeichnen mich als Witwe und Frau eines Servitors, aber ich weiß, du bist noch da drin, mein Liebster. Würdest du mich doch nur ansehen ..."

languages.text: « Les gens considèrent que je suis veuve, et désormais l'épouse d'un servitor, mais je sais que tu es encore là, mon amour, quelque part sous ce tas de ferraille. Si seulement tu voulais bien m'adresser un regard, un seul... »
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."

traits.locale_text: « Les gens considèrent que je suis veuve, et désormais l'épouse d'un servitor, mais je sais que tu es encore là, mon amour, quelque part sous ce tas de ferraille. Si seulement tu voulais bien m'adresser un regard, un seul... »

languages.text: "Millet bana dul diyor, hizmetör karısı diyor ama hâlâ orada olduğunu biliyorum aşkım. Bana bir baksan..."
languages.original_text: "People call me a widow and a servitor's wife, but I know you're still in there, my love. If you would just look at me..."
